content: I am a PhD student at Shandong University, advised by Professor Qiuliang Xu. I am interested in theoretical and applied cryptography, including:  Lattice-Based Cryptography   Privacy-Preserving Protocols   Cryptographic Watermarking   Cryptography under Physical Attacks   Foundation of Cryptography

title: Rupeng Yang
Efficient Lattice-Based Zero-Knowledge Arguments with Standard Soundness: Construction and Applications
